column5: Any suggestions for a great pike and walleye fishing lodges Looking for a great overall fishing experience Looking at aikens wilderness lodge Sabourin lake Bolton lake lodge
Check out Big north Lodge in Minaki. Great Facebook page
Looks like you have some interest in Manitoba. saslodge.com has what you are looking for. New boats, clean cottage. Pick your own dates.........
Ok! I got nothing! I live in ND. I was going to recommend a place in Saskatchewan. Thatâ€™s a long ways from Pennsylvania! Good luck. I hope you find a great place and have a blast!
Bobby Clarke, Reggie Leach and Nolan Patrick are all from Manitoba. You're looking at the right province.
If you are driving, Lac Seul and Minnitaki have loads of big walleyes and pike. Tons of places to stay around Sioux Lookout.
For about 500$ round trip you can fly to Winnipeg. I would take a good look at Greg Dick's Gods Lake lodge. Once you get to Winnipeg everything is taken care of.

All Manitoba: Clifton, Burnie, Stevens-Nicklin Excellent walleye and pike and a few bonus lakers, grayling Boltons Dunlops Lodge talston Bay Lodge, greatest pike fishing ever and walleyes to boot. NWT I have been to all of them, pm if you want details
